module.name: avm-res-compute-hostgroup
module.description: AVM Module for Compute Host groups, also known as Dedicated Host Groups

inputs.name: dedicated_hosts
inputs.type:
map(object({
    name                    = string
    sku_name                = string
    auto_replace_on_failure = optional(bool, true)
    platform_fault_domain   = number
    license_type            = optional(string, "None")
    tags                    = optional(map(string), null)
  }))

outputs.name: resource
outputs.description: All atrributes of the Dedicated Host group

outputs.name: resource_id
outputs.description: The resource ID of the Dedicated Host Group

outputs.name: host_ids
outputs.description: A map of the hosts in the Dedicated Host Group to the resource IDs

outputs.name: name
outputs.description: The name of the Dedicated Host Group
